content.question: Why can't I install the app on my iPhone?
content.answer: iOS requires you to use Safari's 'Add to Home Screen' feature. The install prompt may not appear automatically on iOS, but you can manually add it from the Safari share menu.

content.question: How do I become an admin?
content.answer: Admin roles are granted manually by the development team. Contact support with your email address to request admin access. You'll need to sign out and sign back in after the role is granted.

content.question: Why aren't my emails arriving?
content.answer: Check your spam folder first. Make sure your email address is verified in Firebase Auth. You also need to have 'emailSubscriber=true' in your user profile. Contact support if issues persist.

content.question: Can I use the app offline?
content.answer: Yes! Once you've visited a post while online, it will be cached and available offline. However, new searches and comments require an internet connection. Comments will be queued and sent when you're back online.

content.question: Why aren't push notifications working?
content.answer: Make sure you've granted notification permission in your browser settings. Push notifications require HTTPS (they work on the production site). Some browsers, especially Safari on iOS, have limited push notification support.

content.question: How do I report a bug?
content.answer: Go to Settings → Feedback and fill out the form. Include what you were doing, what you expected, what happened instead, and your browser/device information. Screenshots are helpful!

content.question: Can I delete my comments?
content.answer: Yes! You can delete your own comments by clicking the delete button (trash icon) on any comment you've written. Post authors and admins can also delete comments on their posts.

content.question: How do I change my username?
content.answer: Your username is based on your Google account display name. To change it, update your Google account profile, then sign out and sign back in to Flicklet.

content.question: What happens if I vote on a post?
content.answer: Your vote (upvote or downvote) is recorded anonymously. The post's score and vote count update in real-time. You can change or remove your vote at any time.

content.question: Can I use Flicklet without signing in?
content.answer: You can browse and read posts without signing in, but you need to sign in to vote, comment, or access your personal lists. Sign-in is required for the full experience.
